name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title card for 'Midnight Aurora: A Winter Idol Night'.
Kobo Kanaeru performs 'Anata no Koto ga Suki da nante Ienai n desu.'
scenes.song_name: Anata no Koto ga Suki da nante Ienai n desu.

subtitles.original: The night shines brighter when she sings...
subtitles.english: The night shines brighter when she sings...

subtitles.original: KOBO KANAERU
subtitles.english: KOBO KANAERU

subtitles.original: Special guests are here to join the fun so don't blink
subtitles.english: Special guests are here to join the fun so don't blink

subtitles.original: KUREIJI OLLIE / AYUNDA RISU / AIRANI IOFITTEEN / PAVOLIA REINE
subtitles.english: KUREIJI OLLIE / AYUNDA RISU / AIRANI IOFITTEEN / PAVOLIA REINE

subtitles.original: VESTIA ZETA
subtitles.english: VESTIA ZETA

subtitles.original: SHIRAKAMI FUBUKI / SAKURA MIKO / MOCOCO ABYSSGARD / FUWAWA ABYSSGARD
subtitles.english: SHIRAKAMI FUBUKI / SAKURA MIKO / MOCOCO ABYSSGARD / FUWAWA ABYSSGARD

subtitles.original: OURO KRONII
subtitles.english: OURO KRONII

subtitles.original: NATSUIRO MATSURI / OOZORA SUBARU
subtitles.english: NATSUIRO MATSURI / OOZORA SUBARU

subtitles.original: OTONOSE KANADE / TODOROKI HAJIME
subtitles.english: OTONOSE KANADE / TODOROKI HAJIME

subtitles.original: NERISSA RAVENCROFT
subtitles.english: NERISSA RAVENCROFT

subtitles.original: HOUSHOU MARINE
subtitles.english: HOUSHOU MARINE

subtitles.original: The moment we've all been waiting for...
subtitles.english: The moment we've all been waiting for...

subtitles.original: Ha-a-ha-a-a...
subtitles.english: Ha-a-ha-a-a...

subtitles.original: こんなことなるなんて　会う前にわかってたら
subtitles.english: If I'd known it would turn out like this before we met...

subtitles.original: もう少しだけ　しゃんとした僕を　見せられたはずなんだ
subtitles.english: I should have been able to show you a slightly more proper version of myself.

subtitles.original: どうしたらいいのかなんて　頭ではわかってるけど
subtitles.english: I know in my head what I should do, but...

subtitles.original: 何気ないちょっとした言葉で
subtitles.english: With just a casual word or two...

subtitles.original: 嬉し顔が出ちゃって　こんなバレバレじゃ格好悪いな
subtitles.english: A happy face slips out; it's so obvious, it's embarrassing.

subtitles.original: けどこのままじゃ引き下がれないよな　今も顔が照れくさくて
subtitles.english: But I can't just back down like this, even now my face is blushing.

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きだなんて言えないんです　この気持ち伝わったら
subtitles.english: I can't say that I love you; if these feelings got through...

subtitles.original: 嬉しいだって怖いから　何も言えずまたさよなら
subtitles.english: Because I'm happy but also scared, I say goodbye again without saying a word.

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きすぎてたまらないんです　明日こそは言えるかな
subtitles.english: I love you so much I can't help it; I wonder if I'll be able to say it tomorrow.

subtitles.original: あなたも僕に同じように　恋してたらなんて考えちゃうな
subtitles.english: I can't help but think, what if you were in love with me too?

subtitles.original: 会えない日が続いてる　このままじゃよろしくない
subtitles.english: The days we can't meet continue; this isn't good.

subtitles.original: 会ったところで何ができるってわけじゃないんだけど
subtitles.english: It's not like I can do much even if we did meet, but...

subtitles.original: こんな恋は二度とないな　頭ではわかってるけど
subtitles.english: A love like this will never happen again; I know it in my head, but...

subtitles.original: 眩しすぎるその笑顔が
subtitles.english: That smile of yours is too dazzling.

subtitles.original: 僕を焦らせるんだ　ずっと見ていたくなるような
subtitles.english: It makes me feel impatient; I want to keep looking at it forever.

subtitles.original: 見逃したくなくなってしまうような　こんな気持ちわかるのかな
subtitles.english: Like I don't want to miss a thing; I wonder if you understand these feelings.

subtitles.original: あなたが笑ってるなら　それでいいんです　でも隣は僕がいいな
subtitles.english: If you're laughing, that's enough for me; but I wish I was the one beside you.

subtitles.original: もしかしたら実は　ずっと気づいてるんじゃないかな
subtitles.english: Maybe you've actually known all along.

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きすぎてたまらないんです
subtitles.english: I love you so much I can't help it.
